containerId.description: The ID of the container to add this plugin to

environments.description: The environments to display this plugin in

event.description: The name of a custom event to fire when the button is clicked

excludePaths.description: Exclude the plugin from these paths

includePaths.description: Include the plugin on these paths (overrides excludePaths)

isContainer.description: Turns the plugin into a container for other plugins

isPalette.description: Opens the URL in a palette instead of a new tab

paletteRect.description: he dimensions and position of a palette box

titleI18n.description: The button text in other supported languages

^[a-z]{2}(-[A-Z]{2})?$.description: ISO language code (`en` or `en-US`) with translated button text

url.description: The URL to open when the button is clicked

passConfig.description: Append ref, repo, owner, host, and project as query params on new URL button click

passReferrer.description: Append the referrer URL as a query param on new URL button click

project.description: The name of the project to display in the Franklin Sidekick

host.description: The host name of the production website

container.description: The ID of the dropdown container to add this plugin to

pushDown.description: Have Franklin Sidekick push down page content instead of overlaying it

pushDownSelector.description: The query selector for absolute elements to also push down
